author: Lisa F
title: Fantastic First Trip to New York City
text: I was extremely happy with this hotel as the location could not be better. The staff was very helpful in identifying how to reach certain parts of the city (subway, walking, etc). This was my first trip to New York City, so I did not know what to expect. You should plan to do some walking as most places are easily reached by foot. I was surprised how much we used the subway to reach points of interest. The subway cost for a single ride is $3 and the machines do accept credit cards, though I always carried cash for this purpose. Also, I am happy to report that New Yorkers are very friendly and helpful! On the next block on the corner is a grocery store called Food Emporium where you can buy most anything for your day trips. Also, they had a very extensive deli which you could take to your room as a fridge and microwave are available. We saved quite a bit of money utilizing this option. Overall, this trip was everything I dreamed it would be and more. I would highly recommend this hotel and plan to stay here again on my next visit to NYC.
